--------------------------------------------------
ID: C1B11IW_00
From: Internal News <ONE.Chalhoub@chalhoub.com>
To: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
CC: 
BCC: 
Date: 2024-12-19 11:02
Subject: Transform Chalhoub: 2024 Year-End Highlights, The Talent Acquisition Learning Suite, 30% Discount at Ray-Ban, G.O.A.T Awards Winners, Patyka Skincare Truck, 15 years of Michael Kors, Internal Jobs & Swarovski this Holiday Season
--------------------------------------------------
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/xl3HdlVL_UiQOUrPfQcm8Q/544502/4C7433AD8F37E0FA9D7A0F760761734E/top-banner-eng.png> 	
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/xl3HdlVL_UiQOUrPfQcm8Q/550747/E9499A228311E03AF83BB5B32855C24F/chalhoub-sports-day-18.gif> 	

Transform Chalhoub: 2024 Year-End Highlights


As we approach the close of 2024, here's an update on Transform Chalhoub, our transformation programme designed to reshape the Chalhoub Group's operational landscape.

Transform Chalhoub is set to revolutionize our operations through the implementation of innovative end-to-end business processes and cutting-edge technologies. By introducing state-of-the-art systems like SAP and Blue Yonder, we aim to create a unified, efficient approach that aligns with industry best practices and market standards.

Read more <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.onechalhoub.com%2Fredir%2Ft%3Fs%3Dhttps%253a%252f%252fonechalhoub.connexionsnow.com%252farticle%252ftransform-chalhoub-2024-year-end-highlights%26t%3DU9SNiJg0GQTL7hVYOSWdyJuc%252fgGnWD4VMSwo7%252by4NfkA1kd2MqmJGffoONiqaUeTdgNvL4YBPB%252by%252fkAoxurgWREobGvJ4c3TMLCb%252fTxe5OvywjcUNqQb95uAUFdwHu8swmfw%252bxVMRmbuyjpQ5d5%252bHce3RNwxoGWbcp6VX1kmhQ4LzowUifH3llQR9RkbR083Rr5b1HIhPEJttRFRJ7NIz6UaBFwrafXdwQEEueha5%252fIWJQZ1IFjesBL0fJ3gP74FyeFxHqqGj7muJPiBufY94R90zdZ6hZSN9QXU5EPV95AqubxBH4G3xL6ncRr5qcT7&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7C20fc354c985f4ebb9cf308dd1ffb1a07%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638701885515316243%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=9ntiISsAzMmE8H20nUKtndPSEjcBFHk%2B88cFMJORIS4%3D&reserved=0>

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/xl3HdlVL_UiQOUrPfQcm8Q/545368/F66B325DABDFF1826C8D51AC67B8E3FC/nuggets-06.png> 	

THE TALENT ACQUISITION LEARNING SUITE IS LIVE!

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/xl3HdlVL_UiQOUrPfQcm8Q/550741/52073B18E1E6FBC286CCB98C80DE9FC3/picture1-1.jpg> 	
We are excited to announce the launch of the Talent Acquisition Learning Suite now available on Chalhoub University, featuring the new Hiring Manager Toolkit e-Learning.

This toolkit is designed to equip Hiring Managers with the knowledge and skills needed to navigate the recruitment process effectively. With practical insights and actionable strategies, the e-Learning module will help enhance your recruitment approach and ensure a seamless experience for both candidates and stakeholders.

Explore now <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.onechalhoub.com%2Fredir%2Ft%3Fs%3Dhttps%253a%252f%252fchalhoubuniversity.com%252fcourse%252fview.php%253fid%253d3375%26t%3DU9SNiJg0GQTL7hVYOSWdyJuc%252fgGnWD4VMSwo7%252by4NfkA1kd2MqmJGffoONiqaUeTdgNvL4YBPB%252by%252fkAoxurgWREobGvJ4c3TMLCb%252fTxe5OvywjcUNqQb95uAUFdwHu8swmfw%252bxVMRmbuyjpQ5d5%252bHce3RNwxoGWbcp6VX1kmhQ4LzowUifH3llQR9RkbR083Rr5b1HIhPEJttRFRJ7NIz6UaBFwrafXdwQEEueha5%252fIWJQZ1IFjesBL0fJ3gP74FyeFxHqqGj7muJPiBufY94R90zdZ6hZSN9QXU5EPV95AqubxBH4G3xL6ncRr5qcT7&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7C20fc354c985f4ebb9cf308dd1ffb1a07%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638701885515339070%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=fZCIthvi3Cww0EdIFiFG3EnKZFICjfjI8NNHvQzJwMo%3D&reserved=0> !

ENJOY 30% OFF AT RAY-BAN

Start the new year in style and grab the perfect Christmas gift with your exclusive 30% discount at two more Ray-Ban stores:
- Ray-Ban – Mirdif City Centre
- Ray-Ban – Dubai Hills

Avail the discount with your Chalhoub ID.

Happy shopping!

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/xl3HdlVL_UiQOUrPfQcm8Q/550742/2188A0C4F47343BA88436C65F7B770DA/copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-internal-news-74.gif> 	
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/xl3HdlVL_UiQOUrPfQcm8Q/545351/919C7B81AA9DF6D03EBD8D48419607D7/nuggets-14.png> 	

CONGRATULATIONS TO OUR G.O.A.T AWARDS WINNERS

SGII & JV Management hosted their bi-annual G.O.A.T Recognition Awards last week, with over 60 nominations and 10 deserving winners, both individual and team, across multiple categories. The winners were recognised and celebrated for their fantastic contributions. Congratulations to all the winners!

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/xl3HdlVL_UiQOUrPfQcm8Q/550743/DCA8B173DCE2A3C23154EA70991162D6/copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-internal-news-75.gif> 	
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/xl3HdlVL_UiQOUrPfQcm8Q/544585/5EB3FE7813D546D88AA9D8F19FDBA837/nuggets-19.png>

chunks.text:
CHECK OUT THE PATYKA SKINCARE TRUCK

Don’t forget to visit the Patyka skincare truck at Kite Beach on the 19th, 20th, and 21st of December! 

Discover clean beauty, grab exclusive gifts, and glow —see you there! 

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/xl3HdlVL_UiQOUrPfQcm8Q/550746/50B765D5831BED23B9F32A0B0239EF71/copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-internal-news-78.gif> 	
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/xl3HdlVL_UiQOUrPfQcm8Q/545128/71F2F380A1184FCC307F70A2FB4B824C/nuggets-44.png> 	

MICHAEL KORS 15 YEAR CELEBRATION

A glamorous evening in Dubai to celebrate 15 years of Michael Kors in the Middle East at the Gilt Sky Bar atop the luxurious Burj Al Arab. Those in attendance were treated to a rare, special display of 15 archival custom Michael Kors Collection gowns, designed and worn by some of Hollywood’s biggest, most glamorous names.

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/xl3HdlVL_UiQOUrPfQcm8Q/550744/BB40B6093C714E72DF52C0C2AE76D92C/copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-internal-news-76.gif> 	
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/xl3HdlVL_UiQOUrPfQcm8Q/545300/33868F716A0B3E87D9F47D5BE64E95AC/nuggets-52.png>

SWAROVSKI BRINGS ITS SIGNATURE SPARKLE THIS HOLIDAY SEASON

Swarovski is sparkling everywhere this holiday season, with stunning Christmas tree collaborations at The Club in West Palm Beach and Clé D'or Luxury Lounge. Meanwhile, Swarovski boutiques across the UAE have been hosting festive activations, including personalized embossing of Swarovski boxes and a co-branded chocolate cart with Mirzam cookies.

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/xl3HdlVL_UiQOUrPfQcm8Q/550745/66879A4B573318D99051B848BA3C708E/copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-internal-news-77.gif>
